hero.title: Great hair for the whole family
hero.subtitle: For nearly 30 years, Friendly Cuts has been the go-to salon for families in our community. From kids' first haircuts to grandma's weekly style, we treat everyone like family. Walk-ins welcome!

about.title: A Family Tradition
about.subtitle: Serving our community since 1995
about.content: Started by Maria and Tom Johnson, Friendly Cuts has been cutting, styling, and coloring hair for families in our neighborhood for nearly three decades. We believe everyone deserves to look and feel great, with friendly service and affordable prices.
